issue.title: Repo.Smart#exists()

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body: Let's add a method `exists()` to `Repo.Smart` to check whether the repository exists or not.

issue.title: Existence.java:43-44: Use this class to implement...

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
The puzzle `1379-ca8e6892` from #1379 has to be resolved:

https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/blob/da1f79f30a3326ff43c1249f9955ac6d786928af/src/main/java/com/jcabi/github/Existence.java#L43-L44

The puzzle was created by amihaiemil on 07-Apr-18. 

Estimate: 30 minutes, role: DEV.

If you have any technical questions, don't ask me, submit new tickets instead. The task will be "done" when the problem is fixed and the text of the puzzle is _removed_ from the source code. Here is more about [PDD](http://www.yegor256.com/2009/03/04/pdd.html) and [about me](http://www.yegor256.com/2017/04/05/pdd-in-action.html).

issue.title: (#1384) Now using 'Existence' for all runtime exists() implementations

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
This PR:
* Solves #1384 by substituting all `exists()` implementations with the new `Existence` class where possible

Note: @amihaiemil using `Existence` for the mocks doesn't look like a good idea (I didn't try it)

body: The puzzle `1382-3526ef36` has disappeared from the source code, that's why I closed this issue.
